description: Formation of underground plant room extension under existing roadway on western side of the hospital complex and installation of associated small generator on flat roofed section of main hospital building on the Cayton Street frontage.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Within one month of the rooftop plant hereby permitted being installed, a noise survey shall be carried out using the methodology laid out in British Standard 4142:197 (method for rating industrial noise affecting mixed residential and industrial areas).  If necessary, works should be undertaken to ensure the rating level is 5dB below the measured background level (measured at LA90 (1 hour) (fast) during the day and LA90 (5 minutes) (fast) at night, one metre from the nearest noise sensitive facades.

REASON:  In order to protect the amenity of occupiers of nearby buildings.
